title: Adobe Campaign Standard Tutorials - Overview
description: Adobe Campaign provides a platform for designing cross-channel customer experiences and provides an environment for visual campaign orchestration, real time interaction management and cross channel execution. This user guide contains videos and tutorials on the many features and capabilities of Adobe Campaign Standard.

title: Getting Started with Adobe Campaign Standard
description: This video gives you an overview over the Adobe Campaign Standard user interface and the key features and core functionality.

title: Introduction to Adobe Campaign Standard
description: This video gives you a high level introduction to Adobe Campaign Standard.

title: Get Started with the UI
description: This video gives you an overview over the Adobe Campaign Standard user interface and the key features and core functionality.

title: Configure a list
description: Learn how you can change the displayed columns, the order, and the sort order of a list view in Adobe Campaign Standard.

title: Explore Hierarchy and Marketing Activities
description: Understand the hierarchy of programs and campaigns, how to create a marketing program, and how to create a marketing campaign within a program.

title: Manage campaigns
description: Learn  how to create and manage campaigns.

title: Understand profiles and audiences in Adobe Campaign Standard
description: Understand the concept of profiles and audiences and learn how to create profiles and audiences.

title: Create a workflow
description: Learn how to create and edit a workflow.

title: Introduction to reporting
description: Understand  the reporting capabilities of Adobe Campaign Standard

title: Mobile marketing with Adobe Campaign
description: Understand which Adobe Campaign Standard features can support your mobile marketing strategy.

title: Growing with Adobe Campaign
description: Understand the potential next steps to true cross channel orchestration.

title: Creating profiles and audiences - Overview
description: Learn how to navigate to existing profiles and how to create profiles and audiences.

title: Create a profile
description: Learn how to create a profile and how to add it to an audience.

title: Create a test profile
description: Learn how to target recipients who do not match the defined targeting criteria to detect any fraudulent use of your recipient database or to ensure the emails arrive in the inboxes.

title: Import profiles with a workflow
description: Learn  how to import profile data using a workflow.

title: Manage services and subscriptions
description: Learn how to create a service and manage  subscriptions.

title: Audience Destinations - Overview
description: Learn how to leverage Adobe Experience Platform (AEP) Audiences in Adobe Campaign Standard (ACS)

title: Create a new audience using the Unified Segment Builder
description: Learn how to create a new audience using the Unified Segment Builder.

title: Activate Adobe Experience Platform audiences in a workflow
description: This video explains how to activate the Data Services Query Audience within a workflow by using the ‘Read audience’ activity.

title: Change the targeting dimension
description: This video explains how to change the targeting dimension of a delivery for a Platform Audience outside of the primary profile table in Adobe Campaign Standard.

title: Create an email delivery
description: Learn  how to create an email delivery from the homepage.

title: Send a test, prepare and send an email
description: Learn how to send a test email, prepare and then send the email delivery.

title: A/B testing
description: Learn how to configure and send an A/B test, which tests  the subject line.

title: Profile Substitution - Testing email messages using targeted profiles
description: Learn how you can test your email messages using the profile substitution feature.

title: Adding a control group to a delivery
description: Learn how to define a control group for your delivery and how to extract the profiles assigned to the control group after the delivery has been sent.

title: Create a multi-lingual email or SMS delivery
description: Learn how to simplify the operational complexities of sending multilingual campaigns.

title: Convert an existing email, SMS delivery or template to multilingual
description: Learn how to convert and existing email, SMS delivery, or a delivery template to multilingual.

title: Review an email delivery and reports
description: Learn how to review a personalized email delivery and explore different reports that are available in Adobe Campaign Standard.

title: Create and send emails via a workflow
description: Learn  how to create a one time email delivery from the homepage.

title: Predictive send time optimization
description: Understand which workflows are required to sync data between Adobe Campaign and the Journey AI model. Learn how to view send time scores at individual profile level and how to execute email deliveries using a send time formula.

title: Predictive engagement scoring
description: Learn how to view engagement scores at the individual profile level, use scores for targeting engaged users and suppressing fatigued users and how to create typology rules to manage customer fatigue.

title: Create a SMS delivery
description: Learn  how to create a SMS delivery.

title: Create a push notification
description: Learn how to create a push notification.

title: Create a multilingual push notification
description: Learn how to create a multilingual push notification.

title: Introduction to In-App messages
description: Learn how to present the user with contextually relevant in-app messages in response to a customer's real-time behavior within the mobile application.

title: Configure Events
description: Understand how events define which user initiated action will trigger an in-app message to be displayed.

title: Broadcast an In-App message
description: Learn how the Broadcast  template allows you to target all users of your mobile app.

title: Target users based on their Campaign profile
description: Learn how to target known mobile app users with messages personalized with CRM profile attributes.

title: Create an In-App delivery within a workflow
description: Learn how to use the In-App delivery activity to automate sending an In-App message to a target audience calculated in a workflow.

title: Report on your In-App delivery
description: Learn how to present the user with contextually relevant In-App messages in response to a customer's real-time behavior within the mobile application.

title: Configure a mobile application using Adobe Experience Platform SDK
description: Learn how to set up a mobile app in Adobe Experience Platform Launch and how to configure it in Adobe Campaign.
feature: In App, Push, Channel Configuration, Mobile SDK Integration

title: Create a Direct Mail
description: Learn how to create a direct mail.

title: Create and edit a landing page
description: Learn how to can create, edit and test landing pages in Adobe Campaign Standard.

title: Test and publish a landing page
description: Learn how to test a landing page that was built in Adobe Campaign Standard and how to publish it.

title: Configure a landing page template
description: Learn how to configure a landing page template

title: Email Designer overview
description: Understand the general functionality of the Email Designer and how to design an email from scratch.

title: Getting started with the Email Designer
description: Understand  the general functionality of the Email Designer and how to design an email from scratch.

title: Introduction to email content templates
description: Learn how to create an email content template.

title: Configure the mobile view in the Email Designer
description: Learn how to fine-tune the responsive design of an email by separately editing all style options for mobile display.

title: Preview your email and anti spam analysis
description: Learn how to preview your email and the anti-spam analysis.

title: Working with existing content
description: This video explains how to quickly retrieve your creative content from a website and load it into the Email Designer.

title: Creating content using Adobe Dreamweaver
description: Understand what is required to enable the Dreamweaver integration and how to create and edit content for Adobe Campaign Standard using Dreamweaver.

title: Configure product listings in transactional emails
description: Learn which steps that are required to configure product listings in transactional emails.

title: External Signal Activity - Call a workflow with parameters
description: Learn how to start one workflow from another to support more complex customer journeys, while being able to better monitor and react to issues.

title: Configure and run a workflow with the External API activity
description: Learn you to call an external REST API endpoint  to pull personalization data from a third party system into your campaign.

title: Exploring Reports
description: Understand the different reports that are available out of the box for an email delivery.

title: Creating a Dynamic Report
description: Learn how to create a report.

title: Creating a report based custom profile attributes
description: Learn how to create a report based on custom profile attributes.

title: Creating a report based on workflow segments
description: Reporting on Workflow Segments provides the ability to add workflow segment code in dynamic reporting.

title: Creating custom resources
description: Adobe Campaign Standard provides the ability to extend resources or create brand new resources. This multipart tutorial will walk you through the steps needed to create and link custom resources.

title: Managing user access rights
description: Learn you how to define and manage the permissions assigned to different users in Adobe Campaign.

title: Understanding the Adobe Experience Platform Data Connector
description: Learn how existing customers can make their Campaign related data available on Adobe Experience Platform.

title: Mapping custom resources
description: Learn how to map different data types between Adobe Campaign Standard (ACS) and Adobe Experience Platform (AEP)

title: Mapping Experience Events
description: Learn how to map Experience Events in Adobe Experience Platform (AEP)

title: Mapping seed table data
description: Learn how to map you seed data and how to test profiles with the Adobe Experience Platform (AEP)

title: Modifying data mapping
description: Learn how to check the status and modify the data mapping.

title: Checking the status of a data ingestion job
description: Learn how to check the status and modify the data mapping.

title: Create fatigue rules
description: Learn how to set up typology rules.

title: Privacy requests with the Adobe Campaign Standard (ACS) - Overview
description: Learn how the create privacy requests via the Adobe Campaign Standard  interface.

title: Creating namespaces for privacy requests in Adobe Campaign Standard (ACS)
description: Learn how to create namespaces for privacy requests.

title: Modifying custom resources when setting up Adobe Campaign Standard (ACS) for privacy requests
description: Learn how to modify your custom resources in order to fulfill this requirement.

title: Manually creating and tracking privacy requests through the Adobe Campaign user interface
description: Learn how to manually create privacy requests and track their evolution in the Adobe Campaign Standard user interface.

title: Executing privacy requests
description: Understand which workflows access and delete requests and what happens when they are executed.
